#summary &yacute character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesY

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesY Y] > &yacute

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Yacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00dd/index.htm U+000DD].
  * `&Yacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00dd/index.htm U+000DD].
  * `&yacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fd/index.htm U+000FD].
  * `&yacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fd/index.htm U+000FD].
